([[Tbilisi]], [[Georgia (country)|Georgia]]; March 30, 1997) }} The '''Armenia national football team''' ({{lang-hy|ÕÕ¡ÕµÕ¡Õ½Õ¿Õ¡Õ¶Õ« ÖÕ¸ÖÕ¿Õ¢Õ¸Õ¬Õ« Õ¡Õ¦Õ£Õ¡ÕµÕ«Õ¶ Õ°Õ¡Õ¾Õ¡ÖÕ¡Õ¯Õ¡Õ¶}}, ''{{lang|hy-Latn|Hayastani futboli azgayin havakâakan}}'') represents [[Armenia]] in [[association football]] and is controlled by the [[Football Federation of Armenia]], the governing body for [[football in Armenia]].
